metadata.description:
A few weeks fresh from a breakup, my feelings were exactly like the lemon tart that my ex used to make — sweet and comforting memories of our time together co-existed with the sour taste of how it all ended.

This is probably the most vulnerable and raw song song I’ve written to date and I’m proud to release it as my solo-debut on Sound.

---

To collectors — thanks so much for supporting me with this release.

(1) I'm extending presale access to everyone who collected Lost in the Light (my collab with greydient). And also $PRESENT token holders, as a thanks to everyone to all my friends in Chaos & Songcamp.

(2) A 5% split is going to my friend Prashant (aka Carrom Board) who helped bring this song to life. I'm using this as a way of onboarding him to web3.

(3) I'll be investing the other 95% back into promoting Lemon Tart on web2 + into the upcoming album that I've been working on with greydient. 

(4) For the golden egg collector, I also plan to record a custom video of me playing a live acoustic version of this song.

---

LYRICS

Lemon tart and summer breeze
Run by the river and the maple trees
Seize the moment to tell me you love me
I’d have to say I agree
Coffee cake and sleepy tea
On the couch I made it’s you and me
We fall asleep before 10:30
We’re hanging out in our dreams

Forehead kisses, make a wish
I wish I'd miss you just a little less today

Early morning summer rain
Dappled light shines through thе window pane
Skin to skin, feel your breath on my neck
And I’m lost till you whispеr my name
Late to the station and I miss my train
Guess I’ll have to stay another day
I’ll stay with you for as long as you’ll have me
Until you’ll send me away

Oh the taste is bittersweet
Bittersweet, the taste is bittersweet

lyrics.text:
[Verse 1]
Lemon tart and summer breeze
Run by the river and the maple trees
Seize the moment to tell me you love me
I’d have to say I agree
Coffee cake and sleepy tea
On the couch I made it’s you and me
We fall asleep before 10:30
We’re hanging out in our dreams

[Chorus]
Forehead kisses, make a wish
I wish I'd miss you just a little less today
Forehead kisses, make a wish
I wish I'd miss you just a little less today

[Verse 2]
Early morning summer rain
Dappled light shines through thе window pane
Skin to skin, feel your breath on my neck
And I’m lost till you whispеr my name
Late to the station and I miss my train
Guess I’ll have to stay another day
I’ll stay with you for as long as you’ll have me
Until you’ll send me away

[Chorus]
Forehead kisses, make a wish
I wish I'd miss you just a little less today
Forehead kisses, make a wish
I wish I'd miss you just a little less today

[Bridge]
Oh the taste is bittersweet
Bittersweet, the taste is bittersweet

[Chorus]
Forehead kisses, make a wish
I wish I'd miss you just a little less today
Forehead kisses, make a wish
I wish I'd miss you just a little less today
Forehead kisses, make a wish
I wish I'd miss you just a little less today
Forehead kisses, make a wish
I wish I'd miss you just a little less

metadata.name: Lemon Tart #1
metadata.title: Lemon Tart
